Another great option is "What Just Happened?" This movie is a classic and will leave you laughing.

Lastly, "Wild Hogs" is an excellent choice for anyone looking for some good old-fashioned comedy.

- The Hangover (2009) - This movie tells the story of three friends who wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. The movie has received positive reviews for its hilarious plot, excellent performances by the cast members, and memorable soundtrack.
- The Princess and the Frog (2009) - This movie tells the story of a young princess who is turned into a frog prince in order to escape her cruel stepmother. She falls in love with the handsome frog prince, who is also secretly in love with her. The movie has received positive reviews for its adorable plot, excellent performances by the cast members, and memorable soundtrack.
